cards.markdown: I confess. I’m one of the few people left on earth who thinks that a video iPod is a pretty stupid idea. Today made me happy. You see, today, the rumours said, we’d get a phone with iTunes (and [we did](http://www.apple.com/itunes/mobile/)), and maybe, just maybe a video iPod. Instead, we got this: [![Ipodnano](https://i1.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2005/09/ipodnano-tm.jpg?resize=400%2C250 "Ipodnano")](https://i1.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2005/09/ipodnano.jpg) It’s got the same capacity as the original iPod or the recent iPod Minis, but it’s tiny. It’s got a colour screen. It’s called the [iPod nano](http://www.apple.com/uk/ipodnano/). And it doesn’t play videos.
